meanings.definition: The quality or state of being decided or determined.
meanings.sent1: Her decidedness in choosing a career path impressed everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The team's decidedness to finish the project ahead of schedule paid off.
meanings.sent3: His decidedness to wear mismatched socks to the important meeting caused a few chuckles.
meanings.sent4: The decidedness of the old tree to stand tall despite the storm was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The decidedness of the toddler to eat only green foods was both amusing and challenging for his parents.

meanings.definition: The act of making a firm decision.
meanings.sent1: After much thought, her decidedness to travel solo around the world grew stronger.
meanings.sent2: His decidedness to start his own business was met with both excitement and nervousness.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed decidedness in choosing to nap on the warm laundry instead of the comfy bed.
meanings.sent4: The decidedness of the river to carve through the mountains over centuries is a testament to its power.
meanings.sent5: The decidedness of the detective to solve the case led to uncovering a surprising truth.
